nodes.text: The Hoopster's Prank was a freighter owned by Booster Terrik and used in his smuggling operations. It was often code-named Sycophant Jolly.

During the Caamas Document Crisis of 19 ABY, a New Republic task force under the command of General Garm Bel Iblis used searching the Hoopster's Prank as a pretext for breaking a Frezhlix blockade of Sif'kric.
